DOC.brief_summary: The aim study analyze effectiveness GnRh antagonist treatment early ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: GnRH Antagonist Treatment Early Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) serious complication ovarian stimulation protocol . Gonadotrophin-releasing hormone ( GnRH ) antagonist administration luteal phase recently propose new approach management patient establish severe OHSS We analyze response egg donor moderate- severe early ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome GnRH antagonist stimulation protocol administration daily dose GnRH antagonist ( Cetrorelix 0.25 ) 7 day second day oocyte retrieval compare placebo ( saline solution ) .
DOC.criteria: Egg donor Volunteers . 1835 year old Healthy BMI < 30 OHHS oocyte retrieval define ascitis > 9 cm2 associate abdominal pain , sickness , abdominal distention , haematocrit ( Ht ) > 45 % white blood cell count > 15,000/mm3 creatine > 1.2 mg/dl transaminase > 40 IU/liter BMI > 30 Allergy GnRH antagonist
